name: TheArthritisCoachPodcast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Biggi Fraley, a.k.a. The Arthritis Coach, empowers arthritis sufferers to reverse their disease by addressing the underlying (and often unaddressed) causes, so that they can get their health, happiness, mobility, and life back!

Diclaimer: This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
